title: F/S M. Brown color error....no Red
author: tedzan

posts.post_title: F/S M. Brown color error....no Red
posts.post_content:
In the 6-color printing process of the T206's the Red (or Pink) ink was applied last....and, this M. Brown card is certainly evidence
 of this, since all the colors are there but Red.

The "red-less" M. Brown portrait is $650......or best offer.

The normal M. Brown portrait is also for sale.... $150.

Email me ...... [url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/tedzan77/images/websize/T206MBrownMissing%20Red50x.jpg[/img]

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/tedzan77/images/websize/T206MBrownMissing%20Red50xb.jpg[/img]



TED Z
.

I would say 2/3 of VCP since 2/3 of the card is present...
Haha. Cool card!  Good luck with sale.
